name: Primrose Academy
description:
Primrose Academy for the Regally Royal lives up to its name. Only the best of the best is accepted there. But me?! I may fit the royal part of the title, but regal is not in my vocabulary. I can’t attend this academy! These students are going to eat me up and spit me out while dabbing their lips with handkerchiefs. This academy is perfect. These other students are perfect. Their lives are perfect…

Right?

(Hi, LunarMoon here. Um…this game is something special. I’ve tried to make it as well presented as I can, but there will probably be spelling mistakes and errors galore. Also this is my first time ever using Renpy and I’m not entirely sure of what I’m doing, so please don’t roast me too hard. It’s not Thanksgiving just yet. Primrose Academy is just a prototype of an idea I have and I’m sure a lot of things are going to change if I decide to continue it. So yeah…)

(Thanks for checking it out! I apologize in advance…)

WARNING:  Mild swearing (13+)

Quick Credits:

Character Art by CHIBI  (https://chibi785.itch.io/)

Backgrounds by Lornn  (https://lornn.itch.io/)

GUI by Foleso  (https://foleso.itch.io/)

Rest of credits are in-game

Okay bye
